The four fuels that maintain sentient be: Solid food, whether coarse or fine
How to regard solid food [sn12.63:6.24]: A couple crossing a desert and eating their child's flesh to survive
How to regard contact as fuel (a analogy: A flayed cow being bitten by creatures wherever she stands
How to regard mental intention as fuel (: A person being dragged towards a pit of glowing coals and intending to get far away
